topics.title: Element Types
topics.string:
Element Types are hard coded into the logic of WorldWeaver, however these types can be processed however you like.
To adjust how they are handled you can modify the: ~/Config/ElementProcRules/ElementByType.json file.
You will want to make a backup of this file before editing it.
This particular configuration file tells WorldWeaver what child Element Types each Element should process.
The possible Element Type choices are (To see the details of each of these use: _help element type <type>):

- action
- game
- global
- input
- logic
- message
- move
- object
- player
- room
- set
